summary: Test 'Can update schedule action' fails with 'context deadline exceeded' error during ScheduleClient.describe() call. The gRPC deadline is being exceeded when updating schedule actions in the TypeScript SDK test suite.
userImpact: Tests fail intermittently during schedule operations, blocking CI/CD pipelines and potentially masking real issues.
rootCause: gRPC context deadline exceeded during ScheduleClient._describeSchedule operation, suggesting either insufficient timeout configuration or server-side performance degradation.
resolutionDetails: Issue was resolved through timeout configuration or server-side performance improvements.
